item.title: Docker Desktop 4.46.0 Released
item.description:
Learning center walkthrough for Docker MCP Toolkit, PAC configuration control, and redesigned update experience

Added Learning center walkthrough for Docker MCP Toolkit and onboarding improvements Administrators can now control PAC configurations with Settings Management Update experience redesigned for easier management Docker Buildx v0.28.0 Docker Engine v28.4.0 Fixed slow Docker Desktop startup on Mac Improved Docker Model Runner security on Mac and Windows View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.45.0 Released
item.description:
Docker Model Runner is now generally available

Docker Model Runner is now GA Docker Compose v2.39.2 Docker Buildx v0.27.0 Docker Engine v28.3.3 Fixed diagnostics crash behind authenticated proxy Mac: Fixed crash after waking from sleep Windows: Fixed CLI plugin deployment permissions View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.44.3 Released
item.description:
Security fix for CVE-2025-9074

Fixed CVE-2025-9074 - malicious container access vulnerability Fixed Docker Offload dialog blocking dashboard access View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.44.2 Released
item.description:
Docker Offload Beta support

Added Docker Offload to Beta features settings Updates to support Docker Offload Beta View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.44.1 Released
item.description:
Bug fixes for startup and WSL 2 issues

Fixed startup failure when vpnkit CIDR is locked Windows: Fixed volume visibility after upgrade Windows: Fixed WSL 2 proxy authentication error View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.44.0 Released
item.description:
WSL 2 stability, Model Runner improvements, Apple Virtualization default

WSL 2 stability improvements Docker Model Runner request/response inspection Multiple model support with resource warnings Apple Virtualization is now default VMM on Mac Docker Compose v2.39.1 Docker Engine v28.3.2 New docker desktop kubernetes command Settings search functionality added View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.43.2 Released
item.description:
Version upgrades and model CLI update

Docker Compose v2.38.2 Docker Engine v28.3.2 Docker Model CLI v0.1.33 View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.43.1 Released
item.description:
UI and extension communication fixes

Fixed Docker Desktop UI breaking with HTML in Ask Gordon responses Fixed extensions backend communication issues View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.43.0 Released
item.description:
Compose Bridge GA, security fixes

Compose Bridge is now generally available Docker Buildx v0.25.0 Docker Engine v28.3.0 Fixed CVE-2025-6587 - sensitive environment variables in logs Fixed container port mapping issues Settings Apply button no longer restarts VM View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.42.1 Released
item.description:
Docker Compose upgrade and bug fixes

Docker Compose v2.37.1 Fixed Docker domains unreachable with invalid proxy Fixed port exposure deadlock Mac: Fixed empty container port list on creation Windows: Disabled Resource Saver mode in WSL 2 View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.42.0 Released
item.description:
IPv6 support, Docker MCP Toolkit integration, Model Runner for Windows ARM

Expanded network compatibility with IPv6 support Docker MCP Toolkit natively integrated Model Runner available for Windows ARM GPUs Gordon integrates MCP Toolkit with 100+ servers Docker Buildx v0.24.0 Docker Engine v28.2.2 Fixed memory protection keys for VS Code Dev Containers Sign-in Enforcement available to all subscriptions View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.41.2 Released
item.description:
Model Runner menu display fix

Fixed Models menu displaying when Model Runner not supported View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.41.1 Released
item.description:
Proxy configuration and DLL conflict fixes

Fixed startup failure with proxy in admin-settings.json Windows: Fixed llama.cpp DLL conflicts with 3rd party tools View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.41.0 Released
item.description:
Model Runner on Windows, Microsoft App Store, security fixes

Docker Model Runner available on x86 Windows with NVIDIA GPUs Push models to Docker Hub with Model Runner Model management UI in Docker Desktop Docker Compose and Testcontainers support Model Runner Available in Microsoft App Store Docker Engine v28.1.1 Fixed CVE-2025-3224, CVE-2025-4095, CVE-2025-3911 View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.40.0 Released
item.description:
Docker Model Runner Beta for Mac with Apple Silicon

Pull, run, and manage AI models from Docker Hub (Beta) Docker Buildx v0.22.0 Docker Compose v2.34.0 Docker Engine v28.0.4 NVIDIA Container Toolkit v1.17.5 Fixed UDP forwarding to containers Mac: Unix domain socket sharing support Windows: Improved WSL2 port-mapping throughput View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.39.0 Released
item.description:
Docker Desktop CLI GA, multi-platform image support

Docker Desktop CLI is now GA with docker desktop logs Support for --platform flag on docker load and save Docker Compose v2.33.1 Docker Engine v28.0.1 Ask Gordon improvements for deeper context Fixed CVE-2025-1696 - proxy credentials disclosure Fixed Kubernetes PKI certificate expiration View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.38.0 Released
item.description:
PKG installer GA, multi-node Kubernetes, independent updates

PKG installer for Mac is now GA Enforcing sign-in via configuration profiles GA Components can be updated independently (Beta) Multi-node Kubernetes clusters support Ask Gordon more widely available (Beta) Docker Engine v27.5.1 containerd v1.7.24 Fixed container creation with curl when ECI enabled View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.37.2 Released
item.description:
Mac security component update prevention fix

Mac: Prevents vmnetd and socket update issues View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.37.1 Released
item.description:
AI Catalog and ECI fixes

Fixed AI Catalog availability in Docker Hub Fixed ECI panic with index out of range error View full release notes

item.title: Docker Desktop 4.37.0 Released
item.description:
Desktop CLI Beta, AI Catalog integration

Docker Desktop CLI for command-line operations (Beta) AI Catalog from Docker Hub in Desktop Docker Buildx v0.19.2 Docker Engine v27.4.0 Default disk usage limit increased to 1TB Mac: Fixed root permission directory creation Windows: Windows on ARM support with WSL 2.3.24+ View full release notes
